--- title: ':LS 빅데이터 스쿨 HomeWork1' author: Subeen date: '2024-07-17' categories: - bigdata --- ### 다음 표의 내용을 데이터 프레임으로 만들어 출력해보세요. ::: {#31e639ed .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df = pd.DataFrame({'제품' : ['사과', '딸기', '수박'], '가격' : [1800, 1500, 3000], '판매량': [24, 38, 13]}) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
제품 가격 판매량
0 사과 1800 24
1 딸기 1500 38
2 수박 3000 13
``` ::: ::: ### 앞에서 만든 데이터 프레임을 이용해 과일의 가격 평균과 판매량 평균을 구해 보세요. ::: {#9e760629 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} sum(df['가격'])/ 3 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` 2100.0 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#ab40cb4f .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} sum(df['판매량']/3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ``` 25.0 ``` ::: ::: ### mpg 데이터를 이용해 분석 문제를 해결해 보세요. ### Q1. mpg 데이터를 불러와 복사본을 만드세요. ::: {#c33dcec4 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg = pd.read_csv('data/mpg.csv') df_new = mpg.copy() df_new ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category
0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact
1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact
2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p compact
3 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 auto(av) f 21 30 p compact
4 audi a4 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p compact
... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ...
229 volkswagen passat 2.0 2008 4 auto(s6) f 19 28 p midsize
230 volkswagen passat 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 21 29 p midsize
231 volkswagen passat 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p midsize
232 volkswagen passat 2.8 1999 6 manual(m5) f 18 26 p midsize
233 volkswagen passat 3.6 2008 6 auto(s6) f 17 26 p midsize

234 rows × 11 columns

``` ::: ::: ### Q2. 복사본 데이터를 이용해 cty 는 city로, hwy는 highway로 수정하세요. ::: {#cf40c063 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} df_new = df_new.rename(columns = {'cty' : 'city'}) df_new = df_new.rename(columns = {'hwy':'highway'}) ``` ::: ### Q3. 데이터 일부를 출력해 변수명이 바뀌었는지 확인해보세요. ::: {#63b40626 .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} df_new.head(5) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv city highway fl category

``` ::: ::: ::: {#dac2c2c3 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} # 데이터프레임의 크기 (행, 열) print("Shape of the DataFrame:", df_midwest.shape) # 데이터프레임의 열 이름 col_names= df_midwest.columns.tolist() print("\n".join(col_names)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Shape of the DataFrame: (437, 28) PID county state area poptotal popdensity popwhite popblack popamerindian popasian popother percwhite percblack percamerindan percasian percother popadults perchsd percollege percprof poppovertyknown percpovertyknown percbelowpoverty percchildbelowpovert percadultpoverty percelderlypoverty inmetro category ``` ::: ::: ::: {#124969cd .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} # 데이터프레임의 데이터 유형 print("Data types:\n", df_midwest.dtypes) # 각 열의 결측값 개수 print("Missing values:\n", df_midwest.isnull().sum()) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Data types: PID int64 county object state object area float64 poptotal int64 popdensity float64 popwhite int64 popblack int64 popamerindian int64 popasian int64 popother int64 percwhite float64 percblack float64 percamerindan float64 percasian float64 percother float64 popadults int64 perchsd float64 percollege float64 percprof float64 poppovertyknown int64 percpovertyknown float64 percbelowpoverty float64 percchildbelowpovert float64 percadultpoverty float64 percelderlypoverty float64 inmetro int64 category object dtype: object Missing values: PID 0 county 0 state 0 area 0 poptotal 0 popdensity 0 popwhite 0 popblack 0 popamerindian 0 popasian 0 popother 0 percwhite 0 percblack 0 percamerindan 0 percasian 0 percother 0 popadults 0 perchsd 0 percollege 0 percprof 0 poppovertyknown 0 percpovertyknown 0 percbelowpoverty 0 percchildbelowpovert 0 percadultpoverty 0 percelderlypoverty 0 inmetro 0 category 0 dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ##문제 2 ###poptotal(전체인구) 변수를 total로, popasian(아시아 인구) 변수를 asian으로 수정하세요. ::: {#e6669417 .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} df_midwest = pd.read_csv('data/midwest.csv') df_midnew = df_midwest.copy() df_midnew = df_midnew.rename(columns = {'poptotal' : 'total'}) df_midnew = df_midnew.rename(columns = {'popasian' : 'asian'}) ``` ::: ::: {#8fd2082b .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} df_midnew ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=11} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## 문제3 ### total, asian 변수 이용해 '전체 인구 대비 아시아 인구 백분율' 파생변수를 추가하고, 히스토그램을 만들어 분포를 살펴보세요. ::: {#f0cb14b0 .cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} df_midnew['asian_pop'] = (df_midnew['asian'] / df_midnew['total']) * 100 df_midnew['asian_pop'].plot.hist() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-13-output-1.png){width=593 height=411} ::: ::: ## 문제3 ### 아시아 인구 백분율 전체 평균을 구하고, 평균을 초과하면 'large', 그 외에는 'small'을 부여한 파생변수를 만드시오. ::: {#41c41cfd .cell execution_count=13} ``` {.python .cell-code} asian_average = df_midnew['asian_pop'].mean() asian_average ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=13} ``` np.float64(0.4872461834357345) ``` ::: ::: ::: {#be9489ef .cell execution_count=14} ``` {.python .cell-code} #평균을 초과하면 'large' df_midnew['large'] = (df_midnew['asian_pop'].mean() < df_midnew['asian_pop']) df_midnew ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=14} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## 문제 5 ::: {#59cdaedc .cell execution_count=16} ``` {.python .cell-code} # 'large'에 해당하는 빈도 large_counts= df_midnew['large'].value_counts() print(large_counts) large_counts.plot.bar() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` large False 318 True 119 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-17-output-2.png){width=575 height=450} ::: ::: ::: {#c8c705fa .cell execution_count=17} ``` {.python .cell-code} # 'small'에 해당하는 빈도 small_counts= df_midnew['small'].value_counts() print(large_counts) small_counts.plot.bar() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` large False 318 True 119 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-18-output-2.png){width=575 height=450} ::: ::: ```
